A salt water pool system is soft on your skin, and you can really tell the difference – the water feels silkier and easier to move through. Pure chlorine systems may irritate your eyes whereas salt water pool systems don’t cause red eyes, itchy skin, or discolored hair.

There are a few cost savings with a salt water pools: there’s no need to buy chlorine chemicals or other possible chemicals. Instead of chemicals, a saltwater pool system uses only pure, natural salt – and then recycles that salt indefinitely. It’s the best way to have a truly eco-friendly pool.

Most pool owners want the benefits of a salt water pool, but are wary of the process and costs. However conversion costs are much lower than you’d expect and a pool can be converted in just a few hours!
